title: Implement Gaussian distribution builder
description: Deliver FR-1 and FR-2 by generating three Gaussian distributions with calibrated overlap and exposing actual overlap metrics.

title: Add distribution manipulation interactions
description: Cover FR-3 and FR-4 by enabling move-with-arrow-keys and explode-split behaviors, including notifications and state transitions.

title: Implement baseline K-Means clustering (k=3)
description: Fulfill FR-5 by running K-Means for k=3, capturing iterations, SSE, and cluster centroid data for downstream metrics.

title: Support alternate k values and recommendations
description: Address FR-6 and FR-7 by adding k=2/k=4 clustering flows, comparison metrics, and recommendation copy.

title: Enhance visualization and point analytics
description: Satisfy FR-8 and FR-9 with centroid markers, misallocated point highlights, and point distance tooltips.

title: Implement baseline reset control
description: Implement FR-10 by adding a control that restores the k=3 clustering view after alternative runs.

title: Align documentation and walkthrough assets
description: Deliver FR-11 and documentation deliverables by maintaining README, PROMPTS, PRD, and screenshot walkthrough.

title: Validate non-functional requirements
description: Ensure NFR compliance (client-only runtime, TS strictness, browser compatibility, fast load, no console errors).
